title: Somebody help me
body:
i dont know what i am doing wrong, i just cant win, at this point this is getting boring, on 5 games 4 i play really good but i cant win, mostly because my ally feeds the wrong enemy (if i play adc the enemy assassin will surely be fed, or if im playing an assassin mid the bruiser will become unkillable) and so on.
i know is probably my fault but i dont understand what i do wrong, it feels like i am not playing for the victory of the game but the victory of the lane.
i watched replays and i cant find this big of mistakes that makes me keep loosing.
I hitted g4 in the preseason but now i am stuck at s3, im  so sad.   {{champion:32}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
It's not entirely your fault, i see than you have a wide champion pool, good movements and game mech.

Maybe i could suggest you to: 

- Try and play with a friend;

- Take a pause when you lose or doing a loosing streak (Because the biggest enemy is tilt)

- Focus on 1 lane instead of moving role to role .

For other tips there is a in depth video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cjgm0ht6OVQ

Hope i was of any help.
Grazie mille, prover√≤ a seguire i tuoi consigli, sperando cambi qualcosa.
